alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 11 at 3:14PM AKST until December 13 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wind shift from south to southwest is expected during times of peak winds.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
